name: ScrewTurn-Wiki
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: ScrewTurn Wiki allows you to create, manage and share wikis.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:Powered by <a class="externallink" href="http:\/\/www\.screwturn\.eu" title="ScrewTurn Wiki" target="_blank">ScrewTurn Wiki<\/a> version ([\d\.]+))
